name: Pichardo - Reserva Familiar Connecticut - Toro
additionalNotes: For many years, ACE Prime has been producing award-winning cigars for some of the most high-profile brands in the industry through Tabacalera Pichardo, their facility in Esteli, Nicaragua. Founded by Don Eradio Pichardo in 2005, Tabacalera Pichardo has developed an outstanding reputation for producing
